metadata.title: CVE-2022-27943 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: libiberty/rust-demangle.c in GNU GCC 11.2 allows stack consumption indemangle_const, as demonstrated by nm-new.

criterions.comment: gcc-7-cross package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
